title: Odd One Out
description:
You are given three digits
a
,
b
,
c
. Two of them are equal, but the third one is different from the other two.
Find the value that occurs exactly once.
input_specification:
The first line contains a single integer
t
(
1≤t≤270
) — the number of test cases.
The only line of each test case contains three digits
a
,
b
,
c
(
0≤a
,
b
,
c≤9
). Two of the digits are equal, but the third one is different from the other two.
output_specification: For each test case, output the value that occurs exactly once.
